dialog-max-start1.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Ah, yes! I know you!
You're the birthday mage!

dialog-max-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: I guess you could say that.

dialog-max-start1.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Yes, yes!

Well, you're invited to the grand opening
of my new fashion shop!

dialog-max-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Oh, neat!

dialog-max-start1.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: ...Next year!

dialog-max-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
What? Next year? Your shop isn't ready
yet?

dialog-max-start1.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Oh, good heavens, no! Not yet!
There's much more to do... so much more!

The interior must be wallpapered and
painted, and the new carpet cut and
layed....

The new furniture must be brought in
from Copenhagen, and that could take
weeks alone!
But, of course, before any of that....

dialog-max-start2.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
The construction crew must finish the
interior!!

dialog-max-start3.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
They have everything they need to begin
and yet they won't do any work!

dialog-max-start3.name: %Felix%
messages: No, we don't have everything.

We need the boss to sign off on the plans,
first.

dialog-max-start4.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
Yes, of course! Of course the boss must
approve first!

dialog-max-start5.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: But the boss is nowhere around!

I gave him the plans days ago! What could
possibly be taking so long?

dialog-felix.name: %Felix%
messages:
Can't begin work until the boss approves
the plans.

dialog-deut.name: %Deuteronomy%
messages:
The boss is usually pretty busy.
Not sure where he is right now.

dialog-maru.name: %Maru%
messages: Meow.

dialog-bmurray.name: %B. Murray%
messages:
As much as I like to loaf around, I sure
hope the boss'll get over here soon so
we can start!

dialog-max-start-s.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
All the crew needs to begin now is a
thumbs up from their boss!
Where is that cat?

dialog-max-catbosshere.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Oh! The cat boss!

Oh, at last! Come tell your crew that you
approve of the construction plans!

dialog-max-end.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
Finally! Now work on my fashion shop
can progress!

dialog-max-crew-success1.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Oh! Approval from the cat boss himself!

dialog-max-crew-success1.name: %Felix%
messages: Yeah, all right. We're good to go.
Let's get started!

dialog-max-crew-success2.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
Brilliant! Now things can finally move
forward!

dialog-max-crewmissing.name: %Max Swagger%
messages: Oh! Approval from the boss!
But is the crew all here to see it...?
